src_original: tatra bījasya naivaṃ bhavati jñānamahamaṅkuraṃ nirvartayāmīti /  aṅkurasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati jñānamahaṃ bījena nirvartita iti /
evaṃ yāvatpuṣpasya naivaṃ bhavatyahaṃ phalaṃ nirvartayāmīti /  evaṃ phalasyāpi naivaṃ bhavatyahaṃ puṣpeṇābhinirvartitamiti /
tasmādasatyapi caitanye bījādīnāmasatyapi cānyasminnadhiṣṭhātari kāryakāraṇabhāvaniyamo dṛśyate /  ukto hetūpanibandhaḥ /
